title: Furnished 1 Bedroom for Rent (all utilities included)
description:
**ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED IN RENTAL PRICE & UNIT FULLY FURNISHED**
Available September 1st! Beautiful, Fully-Furnished 1-bedroom apartment with south and east-facing exposures, high ceilings, and updated kitchen and bathroom. Truly unbeatable location on the beautiful tree-lined Spruce Street, close to both the Market-Frankford Line (11th Street) and Broad Street (Walnut/Locust) subway stops. Step into this historical 1870s brownstone and enjoy its generous layout, including oversized living room with original thin-plank walnut floors, full kitchen with updated appliances, including gas stove and dishwasher, as well as a new built-in bookshelf / pantry combination, and a large bedroom with two full-size closets and black-out blinds.
Apartment 3R provides unmatched convenience paired with the peace and quiet of an upper level rear-unit. You’ll be less than a 10 minute walk from Whole Foods, Acme, Mom’s Organic, Walgreens, and Target. Within a 15 minute walk, you’ll have access to shopping and entertainment along Walnut or South Street, a host of Midtown Village restaurants, Market East shopping district, as well as City Hall. One of Philadelphia’s original four squares, Washington Square Park, as well as the historic Independence Mall, are minutes from your front door. Seger Park, a hidden gem, with its coveted Center City recreation facilities is also just around the corner. The building has access to two courtyards, and a seasonal heated pool open to all residents. Secure mail and package areas with recently updated on-site laundry facilities add to the convenience.
Security Deposit, Last Month's Rent, and small Move-In Fee required after approval of application, credit & background check. 1-year lease required, not available for short term rental. Per association by-laws, only cats will be allowed on a case-by-case basis. NO SMOKING allowed in the apartment. All utilities are included in the rental price.
Please reach out for more information or to schedule a tour!

description: This one-of-a-kind bi-level condominium was custom designed by Philadelphia's Tattooedmom herself, Kathy Hughes. Located in the Commodore Barry Building in the heart of Society Hill this unit has its own private entrance on tree-lined Pine Street. The spacious entry vestibule is large enough to accommodate a bike and includes a convenient coat closet. The living room features soaring ceilings, gracefully proportioned windows, original wood doors, a gorgeous marble fireplace, and columns flanking the space. The 1st-floor bedroom suite is spacious and light-filled with a second marble fireplace, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious en suite bathroom. Enter the lower level through sweeping brick archways into a kitchen with custom cabinetry, tasteful granite countertops, stainless steel appliances. The bonus space next to the kitchen has Osborne & Little flocked wallpaper and is a great space for a dining room, living room, or home office. This level is rounded out by a powder room and a laundry room with great storage space. If that isn't enough storage space there is a separate storage locker in the building's basement. You can't help but be captivated by the unique character of this special home, the elegance of this historic property has been maintained while smart updates throughout have added a modern touch.

title: Pet Friendly Renovated Townhome with New Kitchen and yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Not showing till after July 15
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: This is an amazing home located on a quiet block
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in Design Home, Nest, Apartment Therapy, and Philadelphia Magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and ADT security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite One Shot Cafe on the corner, and both Heirloom Market and Acme only a block away!

Laundry in Building
Hardwoodfloors

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Rowhouse for Rent in Graduate Hospital
description: Welcome to 2613 Christian Street, an updated and well-maintained two bedroom home filled with classic rowhouse charm in the ever popular Graduate Hospital neighborhood. This home is uniquely situated on extra wide lot (16 x 70), which creates larger, more useable living space not only inside but also outside. Prepare to be wowed when you step into the sunny open concept living, dining and kitchen space with its gleaming mid-tone hardwood floors and high ceilings. This space is thoughtfully laid out with plenty of room for large scale living room furniture and a full dining set. There is even a powder room smartly tucked away between the kitchen and dining spaces. The kitchen is a classic style with solid wood cabinetry, gleaming black granite countertops, a neutral tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances (including a gas range!) and a large suburban-sized pantry closet. There is a double window over kitchen sink that provides a bird’s eye view into the back yard space and allows daytime sunlight to fill the kitchen area. The back door is right off the kitchen and provides convenient access to a large outdoor space with ample room for lounging and dining al fresco. There is a dedicated square of soil ready to go for you to plant a summer garden. Upstairs, you'll find two good-sized bedrooms and a generously sized full bathroom. The main bedroom is light and airy with two tall southern facing windows that let in plenty of sun to showcase the room. Inside the main bedroom there is also two closets and a separate, smaller closet “cubby” that is the perfect space for shoe storage if you are channeling your inner organizer. This bedroom is really the perfect, cozy spot to Netflix and chill on a Saturday night. The second bedroom is spacious with a full size closet. The main bathroom features walk-in shower with frameless glass doors, jetted tub for soaking and a double vanity with modern-style vessel sinks. Outside of this bathroom, there are two hall closets for extra storage. Downstairs, the basement is a big bonus with its nicely finished additional living space complete with a powder room. There is also a large, dry storage space complete with shelving to keep things organized in the basement separate from the finished area. The Kenmore washer and dryer are in this space. Another bonus, this block of Christian Street is usually an easy spot to street park, a rarity in Graduate Hospital! This home is truly nestled in the perfect location. In just a few minutes you could walk to Sidecar for brunch, Loco Pez for dinner or even head to any of the restaurants in Rittenhouse Square! In the summer months you are just a few blocks away from swimming at the City’s beautiful O’Connor Pool. It is also an easy walk to shopping at Heirloom Market and along the South Street corridor, greenspace at Schuylkill River Park and Fitler Square Park with its seasonal farmers market. Located in the Chester Arthur Elementary School catchment. Pets considered.

title: Contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom with a private balcony
description:
Contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom with a private balcony overlooking Rittenhouse Square on a high floor of The Dorchester! This spacious two bedroom offers light-filled rooms, great entertaining space and gorgeous views of Rittenhouse Square. Enter into the light-filled great room offering many walls of windows and access to an upgraded private balcony. Located off of the dining room, there is a sleek kitchen with black cabinetry. The luxurious master suite enjoys amazing custom closet space and an ensuite bathroom with an oversized single vanity and glass enclosed shower/tub. The guest bedroom enjoys a wall closet and nearby full hall bathroom with a single vanity and glass enclosed stall shower. Both baths offer contemporary tilework. Rent includes a twenty-four hour doorman and all utilities, including basic cable. Use of the building’s state-of-the-art fitness center, seasonal rooftop pool club, and valet parking in the building’s underground garage are available for an additional fee, subject to availability. No pets permitted. * Floor plan may not reflect all changes made by owner.
